original_title: A Season to Remember 2004-2005 Fighting Illini Basketball
overview: Remember the greatest moments of the greatest season in Illinois men's basketball history. The DVD features game highlights from throughout the 2004-05 season, including Illinois' run during the NCAA Tournament. You'll have an exciting recap of the most memorable games of the season including highlights from Illinois' win over Wake Forest, the record-breaking road victories at Wisconsin and Michigan State and the unforgettable NCAA tournament games versus Arizona and Louisville.
title: A Season to Remember 2004-2005 Fighting Illini Basketball
